gambler:Die.NAME: Die
DESCRIPTIONS: After each combat, you may roll the die.
#r1: Lose #b1 Max HP. NL #r2: Lose #b2 HP. NL #g3: Gain #b15 #yGold. NL #g4: Heal #b4 HP. NL #g5: Upgrade a random card. NL #g6: Gain #b3 Max HP.

gambler:LoadedDie.NAME: Loaded Die
DESCRIPTIONS: Replaces #yDie. After each combat, you may roll the die.

#g1: Next combat, gain [E] at the start of your turn. NL #g2: Draw #b3 additional cards at the start of the next combat. NL #g3: Gain #b30 #yGold. NL #g4: Heal #b12 HP. NL #g5: Upgrade a card. NL #g6: Gain #b6 Max HP.

gambler:Blackjack.NAME: Blackjack
gambler:Blackjack.FLAVOR: It's really just luck. But that doesn't mean you can't take advantage of it.

gambler:FakeDiamond.NAME: Fake Diamond
gambler:FakeDiamond.FLAVOR: Polish it enough and maybe you'll forget that it's fake.
DESCRIPTIONS: Right click at a shop to sell for #b
#yGold. Increase this amount by #b50 whenever you pass a shop.

gambler:PokerChip.NAME: Poker Chip
gambler:PokerChip.FLAVOR: A bit of money always does help things go your way.
DESCRIPTIONS: You may reroll your #yDie for a different result once each combat.

gambler:LuckyCoin.NAME: Lucky Coin
gambler:LuckyCoin.FLAVOR: It probably doesn't do anything... but it can't hurt, right?
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play your #yHand at cost #b0, gain [E] .

gambler:StudyGuide.NAME: Study Guide
gambler:StudyGuide.FLAVOR: What dark secrets could be within? Let's take a peek... Blasphemous! It's calculus.
DESCRIPTIONS: You can now gain #yDexterity at Rest Sites (up to 3 times).

gambler:PotionSeller.NAME: Potion Seller
gambler:PotionSeller.FLAVOR: My potions are too strong for you, traveler. You need a seller that sells weaker potions.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you discard a potion other than at a shop, gain #b70 #yGold.
